verses.kjv: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all ye lands.
verses.ct: Shout with joy to the LORD, everyone on earth!

verses.kjv: Serve the LORD with gladness: come before his presence with singing.
verses.ct: Worship the LORD with happiness â€” come into his presence with songs!

verses.kjv: Know ye that the LORD he is God: it is he that hath made us, and not we ourselves; we are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
verses.ct: Understand that the LORD is God. He is the one who made us, not we ourselves. We are his people, the flock he watches over.

verses.kjv: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.
verses.ct: Walk through his gates with gratitude and into his courtyards with praise. Give him thanks and honor his name.

verses.kjv: For the LORD is good; his mercy is everlasting; and his truth endureth to all generations.
verses.ct: The LORD is good. His mercy lasts forever, and his faithfulness continues through every generation.
